title: Pixel 2XL not charging with the original charger and no "charging rapidly" message.
content:
Info: Pixel 2XL, still under warranty (Until November 9th 2019), I live in Israel.

About a year ago, I started having problems with the original charger, I ca't charge with it and I can't transfer data from the PC to the phone. 

Also, no "charging rapidly" message appears. 

What can I do? how can I send the phone for it to be repaired or something.
